questions.question: In the context of branding, what does the term 'Brand Equity' refer to?
questions.answer: C) The total revenue generated by a brand in a fiscal year
possibleOptions: A) The financial value of a brand in the stock market
B) The perception and value consumers attach to a brand
C) The total revenue generated by a brand in a fiscal year
D) The number of products a brand offers in the market

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a brand style guide?
questions.answer: B) To ensure consistent and cohesive brand representation
possibleOptions: A) To limit creativity in design and messaging
B) To ensure consistent and cohesive brand representation
C) To provide a platform for negative customer feedback
D) To track competitors' branding strategies
